10.title: An Act Relating To State Affairs And Government -- State Police
10.description: An Act Relating To State Affairs And Government -- State Police: would establish a "Blue Alert" system to assist in the apprehension of criminal suspects who are involved in the murder or serious injury of law enforcement personnel

71.title: An Act Relating To State Affairs And Government - State Police
71.description: An Act Relating To State Affairs And Government - State Police: would make the definitions of disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression the same as set forth in Rhode Island general laws section 11-24-2.1.
